title: zugehörige Publikationen des strahlentherapeutischen Referenzzentrums für die Behandlung von hochmalignen B-Zell Lymphomen
text:
Publikationen
Held G, Zeynalova S, Murawski N, Ziepert M, Kempf B, Viardot A, Dreyling M, Hallek M, Witzens-Harig M, Fleckenstein J, Rübe C, Zwick C, Glass B, Schmitz N, Pfreundschuh M. Impact of rituximab and radiotherapy on outcome of patients with aggressive B-cell lymphoma and skeletal involvement. J Clin Oncol. 2013 Nov 10;31(32):4115-22. doi: 10.1200/JCO.2012.48.0467. Epub 2013 Sep 23. PMID: 24062391
[Pubmed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24062391/)

Epub 2014 Jun 17. PMID: 24939657.
[Pubmed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24939657/)

Six versus eight cycles of bi-weekly CHOP-14 with or without rituximab in elderly patients with aggressive CD20+ B-cell lymphomas: a randomised controlled trial (RICOVER-60). Lancet Oncol. 2008 Feb;9(2):105-16. doi: 10.1016/S1470-2045(08)70002-0. Epub 2008 Jan 15. PMID: 18226581.
[Pubmed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18226581/)

Conventional chemotherapy (CHOEP-14) with rituximab or high-dose chemotherapy (MegaCHOEP) with rituximab for young, high-risk patients with aggressive B-cell lymphoma: an open-label, randomised, phase 3 trial (DSHNHL 2002-1). Lancet Oncol. 2012 Dec;13(12):1250-9. doi: 10.1016/S1470-2045(12)70481-3. Epub 2012 Nov 16. PMID: 23168367.

[Pubmed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24493716/)
